Text.Name: LingZhi_Huo
Text.ThingName: Fire Spirit Root: ผลไม้แดงสด Tree
Text.Desc: The plant of ผลไม้แดงสด, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. For its special trait, it has to grow in an environment above 200℃.

Text.Name: LingZhi_Jin
Text.Desc: The plant of ผลไม้ปราชญ์, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. Extremely sensitive to high temperature, but relatively resistant to cold. It has to grow in an environment below 20℃.

Text.Name: LingZhi_Mu
Text.Desc: The plant of Gnarled Vine, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It has a strict requirement for environment temperature, and only grows in between 15-35℃.

Text.Name: LingZhi_Shui
Text.Desc: The Prism Lotus plant, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in places with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It prefers low temperature, and only grows in an environment below -120℃.

Text.Name: LingZhi_Tu
Text.Desc: The plant of Ocher Essence, an elemental medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It avoids low temperature, and only grows in an environment above 30℃.
